name: Black Diamond Technician Shoes - Men's
description: When things get tricky, call on the Technician. The super sticky rubber sole grips granite slabs and sandstone splitters, blurring the line between scrambling and technical climbing. The wrapped construction and midfoot strap lock your foot in place, giving you confidence and precision when you need it.Highly breathable polyester EnduroKnit upper with printed overlays to provide durability in high-wear areas.3D wrap and TPU strap hold foot securely in place in technical terrain.Multiple webbing loops for tagging options when the scrambles become vertical.Rubber toe cap adds durability and protection for gnarly approaches.Moulded EVA midsole comforts underfoot.BlackLabel-Mountain sticky rubber outsole provides traction on the trail and scrambles.
